snippet: Tony Parker broke the Spurs’ franchise record for career assists, leading host San Antonio to a 107-96 win over N.B.A.-best Oklahoma City.
abstract: NBA Roundup; San Antonio Spurs defeat Oklahoma City Thunder, 107-96; other NBA results noted.
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker broke the Spurs’ franchise record for career assists, leading host San Antonio to a 107-96 win over N.B.A.-best Oklahoma City.

headline.seo: Parker Scores 42 Points, Sets Franchise Assist Record in Spurs’ Win Over Thunder
headline.main: Cavaliers Top Mavs on Irving’s Late Shot
headline.print_headline: Parker Sets Spurs Mark In Victory Vs. Thunder
